component.name: Bomberman 64: Recompiled
component.summary: Static recompilation of Bomberman 64 for PC.

description.p:
Bomberman 64: Recompiled is a project that uses N64: Recompiled to statically recompile Bomberman 64 into a native port. This project uses RT64 as the rendering engine to provide some of these enhancements.
The original game is required to run this project.
https://github.com/RevoSucks/BM64Recomp
